title: Affiliate Program — Semrush
content:
Shape marketing while boosting your income

Join the Semrush Affiliate Program and start earning commissions for every first purchase and trial made by your referrals

Apply Now

Trusted by

Why join the affiliate program?
Boost your image

Partner  with an industry-leading
company used by over 10 million marketers and 30% of Fortune 500 companies

High Commissions

Get $200 for every sale you make,
plus $10 for every free trial your
referrals sign up

Last-Click Attribution Model

Get credit for your referrals with
our last-click attribution model and 120 days of cookie life

Make marketing easy

Leverage a variety of our
pre-designed, high-converting promotional materials

Grow with incentives

Earn extra bonuses for your work
and performance starting your
first month

Dedicated support

Our team of seasoned experts
is here to guide you every step
of the way

Apply Now
What can you promote?

Join our program and increase your earnings by promoting Semrush plans and solutions

We're here to help all our affiliates grow—from recently joined newcomers to active performers. Grow, earn more, and enjoy special perks along the way!

Take a look at our Affiliate Program video to learn more
Who can
become an affiliate?

Content Publishers

writing about SEO, PPC, PR, marketing, and content marketing

Marketing Agencies

that want to recommend Semrush to their clients

Course Creators & Professors

who are creating webinars, or teaching SEO and marketing and want to promote Semrush with affiliate links

Video Creators

who produce product demonstrations and reviews with engaging storytelling and high-quality content

All-Around 
Marketers

that want to continue to grow by promoting Semrush

See how one agency grew customer clicks by 300 percent in 9 months with the Semrush Affiliate Program
Success Story

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the Semrush Affiliate Program and how does it work?

The Semrush Affiliate Program allows you to earn commissions by referring customers to Semrush through tracked affiliate links and creatives. It provides an opportunity for you to monetize your audience and earn commissions from each new Semrush referral.

It is easy to apply; just complete the form on this page.

What are the requirements for becoming an affiliate?

What is the commission structure and cookie length

How to join the Semrush affiliate program?

Why was my application declined?
